name: Artie is the MAN (test 2)
description:
This is test 2 of my game called "Artie's Hotel".

PLOT
In this you play as a guy trying to get a room at the hotel, when suddenly, the power goes out. Artie tells you that the power switch is inside of room 101 in the basement, but avoid the mase-like hallways, and the 100 locked doors. And most of all, avoid the evil clones.

I plan to add a lot more but this is the furthest I have ever gotten with a game so I just want to publish the tests now.

Get  Artie on that Tumblr Sexyman tournament. If the letter F and Sans could get there Artie can too.
